history.title: Our History
history.content: Rotary Club Pattaya Marina is the only French-speaking Rotary in Asia. A member of Rotary International District 3340, our club brings together professionals of diverse nationalities united by a common passion: serving the Pattaya community and its surroundings.
history.extendedContent: Since our founding in {year}, we have touched thousands of lives through our education, health and community development projects. Our commitment to humanitarian service remains as strong today as it was at the beginning.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: We are committed to improving the lives of people in need in Pattaya and the surrounding region. Through education, health, community development, and humanitarian aid projects, we take concrete action for a better world.
mission.priorityAreas: Our priority areas of action include youth education, access to healthcare, support for disadvantaged communities and promotion of sustainable development. Each project is chosen to maximize its positive impact on our community.

meetings.address: 559 Moo 10, Beach Road, Pattaya, ChonBuri 20150, Thailand
meetings.description: Our monthly meetings are an opportunity to plan our actions, welcome guests, and strengthen the bonds of friendship between our members.
meetings.visitorsWelcome: Visitors are welcome! If you would like to attend one of our meetings to discover Rotary, please don't hesitate to contact us in advance.

rotaryInfo.title: Member of Rotary International
rotaryInfo.description: Rotary International brings together more than 1.4 million members across 200 countries and territories. Our club is part of this global network dedicated to humanitarian service and peace.
rotaryInfo.districtInfo: Our club is part of District 3340 which covers Thailand. The district includes more than 70 Rotary and Rotaract clubs, united in their mission of community service.
